text: The Baze Senior Knockout Teams national bridge championship is held at the fall American Contract Bridge League (ACBL) North American Bridge Championship (NABC). The Senior Knockout Teams is a knock-out team event. The event typically starts on the first Sunday of the NABC. The event is restricted to Seniors – players 55 years of age or older. ==History== The event was introduced in 1994. It was renamed in 2010 in honor of Grant Baze and is contested for the Baze Trophy. ==Winners== {| class="sortable wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Senior Knockout Teams, 1994 to present |- !
